seg.quote: The prisoners demanded the freedom to congregate within the prison.
There were sounds of protest within.
A mounting wave of dislike and anger rose within me.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
within a particular limit
, ne gre onstran določene meje.

seg.quote: We must ask the schools to keep within their budget.

sense.def:
To be within a particular distance of a place
pomeni biti manj kot tolikšno razdaljo od določenega kraja.

seg.quote: They were within fifty miles of Chicago.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
within sight, within earshot
ali
within reach
, tisto lahko vidimo, slišimo ali dosežemo.

seg.quote: They finally came within sight of the gates.

sense.def:
Within a particular length of time
pomeni preden mine določen čas.

cit.quote: v določenem času, v manj kot

seg.quote: Within minutes I was called to his office.
